about_the_game:
It is night and the Little Weasel has taken it upon themselves to check on all the pets in the city. With the help of the moon, players explore a free roaming city with cool mechanics to climb all over buildings and check on pets.

This super stylized, cute and cool look of this game has challenges and chill all in one. The moon is your friend. Stay within the light of the moon as you use free roaming climbing mechanics to scale buildings and trees in this peaceful city. The sky will reveal the scent of the pets you check in on around town. Make it to the marker and complete the level by checking in on the friend. Use platforming, triple jumps, and climbing mechanics to get around buildings and to your goal while avoiding the shadows.

Also included is the completely precious short stop motion film: "Grim Cutie Presents: Just Grow a House." Grim Cute is an instagram sensation finally in stop motion. The adorable stop motion tale, shows the smallest grim reaper you've ever seen trying to just have a little cabin to live in.
